snippet: Forty-two miners in the United States died on the job in 2013, up from 36 the year before....

headline.print_headline: US Mine Safety: 42 Miners Died on Job in 2013
headline.main: US Mine Safety: 42 Miners Died on Job in 2013

lead_paragraph: Forty-two miners in the United States died on the job in 2013, up from 36 the year before.
